intro: Pleurothallis succedanea, commonly known as the yellow pleurothallis, is a species of orchid native to the tropical regions of South America. It is a small, epiphytic plant that typically grows on trees in humid, shaded environments. The plant produces delicate, fragrant flowers in shades of yellow and white, often in clusters. Its leaves are narrow and革质, adapting to its humid, forest habitat. It is relatively easy to care for, making it a popular choice for orchid enthusiasts.
